General.Name: Honey Badger Silver Inc
General.Description: Honey Badger Silver Inc. acquires, explores for, and develops mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for silver, cobalt, gold, zinc, and lead deposits. The company's Thunder Bay Silver project covering an area of 16,800 hectares located in Ontario. It also holds a 100% interest in the Clear Lake deposit that comprises 121 contiguous claims covering an area of approximately 2,479 hectares located in the Whitehorse Mining District of the Yukon; and Nanisivik project that comprises 3 claims covering an area of approximately 4,850 hectares located in Nunavut. In addition, the company holds interest in the Plata, Groundhog, and Hy silver projects in southeast and south-central Yukon, Canada. The company was formerly known as Honey Badger Exploration Inc. and changed its name to Honey Badger Silver Inc. in November 2020. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 401 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 2Y4
